title: [BUG] [JAVA] OkHttpClient: deprecated property only generates a deprecated getter
description:
Bug Report Checklist

  • Have you provided a full/minimal spec to reproduce the issue?
  • Have you validated the input using an OpenAPI validator (example)?
  • Have you tested with the latest master to confirm the issue still exists?
  • Have you searched for related issues/PRs?
  • What's the actual output vs expected output?
  • [Optional] Sponsorship to speed up the bug fix or feature request (example)
Description

During the OkHttpClient generation, a deprecated property only generates a deprecated getter, while the model attribute, the setter method and the builder method are not deprecated

openapi-generator version

Verified with 6.6.0-SNAPSHOT

OpenAPI declaration file content or url

For the declawed property only the getter method is deprecated

          properties:
            dogType:
              type: string
            declawed:
              deprecated: true
              type: boolean
Generation Details
Steps to reproduce

Deprecate attribute declawed in model
Generate code for OkHttpClient

Current output

Only getter method is deprecated

Expected output

Deprecate property, setter and builder methods

Related issues/PRs
